posts.description: 19:17 A bit of abstract art in nature...a tall bare tree below the long grass on a hill... Is that grass the sign of winter.... Grrr.... Guess all seasons come with their different beauty..... Aah a 🐦 on top the tree.. That's a hadedah ibis... They just love sticking their long bills into the ground for worms... "the early bird catches the worm" May you have a fantastic day/evening further..... Blessing to each one. ↪️if you love travel then check out the link on my bio or visit @gaadgoodcom for more
posts.localization: Katberg Eco Golf Estate, Hotel & Spa

posts.description:
🕒 17:30 When in the forest or in the mountains if it's not on foot,  quad bike or 4x4... You settle for horseback.... How beautiful it is in the Katberg Eco Golf Estate .. Yes these are the tame ones.... What's your best for of travel when you are out and about?........... Today I give a Shoutout to all Travel Enthusiast!... Read on.... Where have you already been in the world?? 🌎🌍🌏 How do you keep proper track of your travels?! ✈✈ Get your Scratch Map by visiting the link in bio 👉 @mikegeyer2009 👉 @gaadgoodcom 😍  follow @gaadgoodcom for Giveaway 🔖 Tag+Send to friend who need this! ❤  Go check out this video @gaadgoodcom or on this link below

posts.description: ⌚16:12 Hello friends.. How about some time around the pool in "paradise"... Nature's calling in the Eco Golf ⛳ Estate of Katberg... Sound inviting... Lots to do and see... Fill your lungs with the healthy misty mountain air combined with the freshness of the surrounding forest.... Or sink back into one of the loungers and cast your eyes upon all but beauty before you.  Appetite wet?  Have a super duper Sunday further..... Its my privilege to be able to share my Journey through my eyes with the special person You that are... And an awesome new week to you ahead 👋
posts.localization: Katberg Eco Golf Estate, Hotel & Spa

posts.description: 16:27 Hello friends throughout the world.. Trust your Saturday is just the best!  So we're on an excursion up the mountains where nature predominantly prevails....where you breathe no better freshness in the air.... So here we have a sunbird almost looking out of control about to land on these beautiful wild orange flowers... The flower is know is the dagga flower...(Leonotis Leonurus)  Sustains dry conditions with ease yet flourishing here on the mountain slopes of Katberg.  Here the sunbirds.. also referred to as honeysuckers are a plenty.. extracting the nectar from these tubular like flowers..chirping continuously in obvious happiness.. Of course there are also other species of birds and insects around. It is indeed Nature's Paradise.. Maybe the Garden of Eden... May you further extract the beauty out of your day/evening... Much Blessings to you
posts.localization: Katberg Eco Golf Estate, Hotel & Spa

posts.description: 17:15 WILD HORSES..🐴 So this treacherous mountain pass turned into quite the adventure... Sometimes a very bad road.. .. But once going forward there will be no turning back for the curiosity of exploring new territory will always be even more exciting.  So here on top of this somewhat secluded mountain lies a completely different world to that of city life... No people in sight, no buildings., absolutely nothing,  just the sight of rolling mountains...and the beauty of nature.... Well what is fascinating is the number of beautiful wild horses that habitat this natural mountain environment.  Exceptionally beautiful!  Here this close group of horses graze and rest high up on a mountain slope. What an afternoon!  A further round-trip of about 40km brings you breathtaking moments that will be etched in your memories forever... Would be a recommended route... Just preferably a 4x4. Otherwise a hair raising experience. Does it get any better than this? ... What a truly magnificent world that seldom gets discovered... Have a super Friday further and a beautiful weekend

17:00 Good afternoon out of South Africa.... Let me jump around on the sharing of this beautiful mountain journey. Standing on top,  some 1963m high, one feels consumed by the almost 360° mountain range that surrounds you...yet in full admiration of the beautiful view before you,  which we are so privileged and blessed with. The mighty mountains of this region stand majestic to everything else.  Have a super awesome day further... Let's count our blessings each and every day...

16:03 Greetings friends..We're going up the mountain.. 6 pics today! .. Slide them across to view.."pick your favorite". These are homes in a golf estate at foot of the mountains in exquisite,  most beautiful surroundings... Nature is not even on your door step... You are within the beauty of nature 🌷... This is Katberg Golf Estate.  Absolutely Magnificent Lifestyle Living at Best!  Which House or which pic of the 6 is your favorite.  Comment below ⤵️
posts.localization: Katberg Eco Golf Estate, Hotel & Spa

posts.description: 15:40 Hello Everyone... We begin a bit of a journey with this, 1800's historical church at the foot of a mountain pass..Balfour in The Eastern Cape of South Africa . The Church catches your immediate attention standing quite prominently in the foreground of the majestic misty, cloud covered mountains in the back.... We're going up there! ... This is the Katberg Mountain Pass... So look out for the pics coming your way... "you have a FREE excursion with me here" Let the majesty of nature further inspire You!

15:30 Greetings friends... Been doing some exploring  in the countryside for new pics... ☺ Is Pink Your favorite color?  Then how about these pretty pink blossoms of a Kapok Tree  lining an entrance to a farm yard... Too beautiful... This in Autumn or Fall as some know it... Each season always beings it's own beauty before our eyes.. So no dull seasons around.  Pink is said to be the color of hope as well as love.. May your day.. This new week blossom in some beautiful new memories... 💖.... Take care.. Be Safe.. 👋

16:05 👋Greetings👋 Happy Easter Everyone :) Aren't waterfalls awe-inspiring... No matter how big or small... When the water is flowing and falling down that sound of nature is a truly remarkable gift to us.... So long as the water is their our dreams and hopes will always be there to fill us with inspiration... Have a super Easter Weekend dear friends.. Many Blessings
